Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.game

Interface IGameBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
Builder<Game>
All Known Implementing Classes:
Game.GameBuilder
public interface IGameBuilder extends Builder<Game>
Represents a generic builder for Game objects.
